snippet: CNN, a unit of Time Warner, is in advanced talks with Mashable that may lead to an acquisition of the social news Web site, Brian Stelter reports in The New York Times.
abstract: CNN, a unit of Time Warner, is in advanced talks with Mashable that may lead to an acquisition of the social news Web site, Brian Stelter reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: CNN in Talks to Acquire Mashable
